channel.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Mi Note 10 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.5.1.0.RFNMIXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 Lite Global

Codename: toco

Version: V12.5.1.0.RFNMIXM | 11.0

Size: 4.5 GB

MD5: 8bbf24c4dfbc9310592864f4ceabea78

Changelog:
[System]
New: Response to gestures is now instant.
New: With 20 times more rendering power, there are now few limits to what you can see on your screen.
New: With custom device model adjustments, any phone becomes faster after the upgrade.
Optimization: MIUI became lighter, faster, and more durable.
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
[Notes]
New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.
New: Dynamic layouts bring the typography in Notes to a new level.
New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.
All-new Notes.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.5.1.0.RFNRUXM Fastboot update for Mi Note 10 Lite Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi Note 10 Lite Russia

Codename: toco

Version: V12.5.1.0.RFNRUXM | 11.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 0f11069adcbf101cebae5e4005dc1cde

Changelog:
[System]
New: Response to gestures is now instant.
New: With 20 times more rendering power, there are now few limits to what you can see on your screen.
New: With custom device model adjustments, any phone becomes faster after the upgrade.
Optimization: Removed unnecessary sound notifications for DND mode
Optimization: Full screen gestures are now ignored on the Lock screen alarm page
Optimization: MIUI became lighter, faster, and more durable.
[System animations]
Optimization: Animations in selected scenes
[Notes]
New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.
New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.
New: Dynamic layouts bring the typography in Notes to a new level.
All-new Notes.
[Control center]
New: Swipe down from the upper left corner to open Notification shade and from the upper right corner to open Control center
New: When Notification shade is open, swipe down from the upper right corner to open Control center
Optimization: MIUI 11 custom toggle order is preserved after updating to MIUI 12
Optimization: Press and hold redirection options
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: Screen lights up with an animation now
New: Status bar color gradient animation
Optimization: Readjusted sensitive areas for the dots in the unlock pattern
Optimization: GPS icon in the status bar
Optimization: The UI for renaming fingerprints
GPS toggle renames as "Location"

Download: Here
